metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6299 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in ytnef before 1.9.1. This is related to a patch described as "2 of 9. Infinite Loop / DoS in the TNEFFillMapi function in lib/ytnef.c."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6299` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.5-9ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libytnef package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-9ubuntu0.1').
